attributes.action: stop these useless petitions which are totally ignored by the pm
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: what is the point of inviting people to express their concerns, when their views are totally ignored. the response to the recent petition which asked to stop the closure of local test centres on evironmental grounds said that the new MPTC are more ecologically friendly, this flies in the face of all sane arguements and proves that the petitons are not even considered.

reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
